How It Works

The Call (Free)

A quick conversation to understand your situation. No strings attached. If I can point you in the right direction in 15 minutes, I will. If you need more help, we'll discuss next steps.

Deep Dive ($20)

One hour of focused work on your problem. This is where we dig in — research, analysis, and concrete recommendations. Most people get what they need here.

Contract Engagement

For bigger projects that need ongoing attention. We define the scope together, agree on deliverables, and I get to work. Pricing depends on complexity and timeline.

FAQ

Why so cheap?

I'd rather help 100 people at accessible prices than 5 people at premium rates. The work is the same either way.

What if I'm not satisfied?

If you don't find value in our conversation, you don't pay. Simple as that.

Do you do ongoing retainers?

Sometimes, for the right fit. Let's talk about what you need.

Questions about pricing?

Just ask. No pressure, no pitch.
